trans-unit.source: Provides a keyboard sink for components that manages tabbing, accelerators, and mnemonics across interop boundaries and between HWNDs.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um sink de teclado para componentes que gere tabbing, Aceleradores e mnemonics através de limites de interoperabilidade e entre HWNDs.

trans-unit.source: This interface implements keyboard message management in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] interoperation scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Esta interface implementa a gestão de mensagens de teclado no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] interoperação cenários.

trans-unit.source: A keyboard sink handles input from particular subsets of the overall keyboard input model for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], and enables some keyboard input to be processed and directed to HWNDs other than the one with current keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Um sink de teclado processa a entrada de subconjuntos específicos do modelo de entrada de teclado geral para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], permitindo algumas teclado de entrada a processar e direcionadas para HWNDs daquele com o foco do teclado atual.

trans-unit.source: If your component contains other components, and maintains a tab order, your component must also implement <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite> and keep track of which component has focus.
trans-unit.target: Se o seu componente contém outros componentes e mantém uma ordem de separadores, o componente também tem de implementar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite>e manter um registo do componente de que tem o foco.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite>

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of the input architecture specifically implemented for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] interop, see [Windows Forms and WPF Interoperability Input Architecture](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver um debate da arquitetura do entrada especificamente implementado para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] interoperabilidade, consulte [Windows Forms e arquitetura de entrada de interoperabilidade do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> each implement the IKeyboardInputSink interface, through explicit interface definitions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>e <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>cada implementa a interface de IKeyboardInputSink, através de definições de interface explícita.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost></xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: The explicit definitions supply default behaviors, and can also be accessed if necessary through an IKeyboardInputSink interface cast of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> or <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>.
trans-unit.target: As definições explícitas fornecem comportamentos predefinidos e também pode ser acedido se necessário, através de uma interface IKeyboardInputSink converter de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>ou <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the sink or one of its contained components has focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o sink ou um dos respetivos componentes contidos tem foco.

trans-unit.source: This method is necessary for forwarding <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A> calls to child components with focus from within the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este método é necessário para reencaminhamento <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A>chamadas para componentes de subordinados com foco partir o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A>implementação.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call HasFocusWithin recursively until you reach the level of specific focus and forward <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A> there.
trans-unit.target: Chamar HasFocusWithin recursivamente até atingir o nível de foco específico e reencaminhar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A>não existe.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the sink or one of its contained components has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o sink ou um dos respetivos componentes contidos tem foco; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the component's container's <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma referência a um contentor do componente <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: This property should initially be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade inicialmente deve ser definida como `null`.

trans-unit.source: Any container that adds the sink to its components list will set KeyboardInputSite before any other methods are called, and it can be set multiple times after that.
trans-unit.target: Antes de quaisquer outros métodos são denominados e pode ser definida várias vezes depois disso, qualquer contentor que adiciona o sink a respetiva lista de componentes definirá KeyboardInputSite.

trans-unit.source: You should set the property to `null` again before disposal.
trans-unit.target: Deve definir a propriedade para `null` novamente antes de disposal.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the container's <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para o contentor <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: Called when one of the mnemonics (access keys) for this sink is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um dos mnemonics (chaves de acesso), para este sink é a invocar.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] message must be WM_CHAR, WM_SYSCHAR, WM_DEADCHAR or WM_SYSDEADCHAR.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] mensagem tem de ser WM_CHAR, WM_SYSCHAR, WM_DEADCHAR ou WM_SYSDEADCHAR.

trans-unit.source: If the component has contained components, the message must be passed in your implementation by calling each contained component's OnMnemonic method.
trans-unit.target: Se o componente tem contidos componentes, a mensagem tem de ser transmitida na sua implementação ao chamar o método de OnMnemonic de cada componente nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: An interface that returns `true` from <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A> will not call OnMnemonic.
trans-unit.target: Uma interface que devolve `true` de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A>não irá chamar OnMnemonic.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateAccelerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: Implementations can choose to perform all specific key combination handling in <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateChar%2A>.and bypass OnMnemonic.
trans-unit.target: As implementações podem optar por executar todos os combinação de chaves específica processamento no <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateChar%2A>e. Ignorar OnMnemonic.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TranslateChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message for the mnemonic and associated data.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem para os dados mnemónica e associados.

trans-unit.source: Do not modify this message structure.
trans-unit.target: Não modifique esta estrutura de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: It is passed by reference for performance reasons only.
trans-unit.target: Este é transmitida por referência por motivos de desempenho apenas.

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Chaves de modificador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Registers the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink"></xref> interface of a contained component.
trans-unit.target: Regista o <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink"> </xref> interface de um componente nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: Components with child components should maintain internal collections of sites and use this method to add a new sink and return the new site.
trans-unit.target: Componentes com componentes do subordinado devem manter internas coleções de sites e utilizar este método para adicionar um receptor de novo e devolver o novo site.

trans-unit.source: You only need to maintain the site collection, because the sink can be obtained from the site.
trans-unit.target: Só tem de manter a coleção de sites, porque o sink de pode ser obtido a partir do site.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink"></xref> sink of the contained component.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink"> </xref> sink do componente nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite"></xref> site of the contained component.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite"> </xref> site do componente nele contidos.

trans-unit.source: Sets focus on either the first tab stop or the last tab stop of the sink.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de focar-se a paragem de tabulação primeiro ou a último paragem de tabulação do sink.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection> are the only relevant values that should be passed to this method in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>são os valores só relevantes que devem ser transmitidos a este método em <xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection></xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether focus should be set to the first or the last tab stop.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o foco deve ser definido como o primeiro ou a último paragem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the focus has been set as requested; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, if there are no tab stops.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver sido definido o foco, conforme solicitado a; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, se existirem não deixa de separador.

trans-unit.source: Processes keyboard input at the keydown message level.
trans-unit.target: Os processos de introdução por teclado ao nível da mensagem de keydown.

trans-unit.source: The message must either be WM_KEYDOWN or WM_SYSKEYDOWN.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem tem de ser WM_KEYDOWN ou WM_SYSKEYDOWN.

trans-unit.source: If the component is unable to handle the input translations and has child components that might have translations, it typically calls TranslateAccelerator method on the child component that holds the current focus before returning a result.
trans-unit.target: Se o componente não consegue processar as entrada traduções e subordinado de componentes que podem ter traduções, normalmente chama o método de TranslateAccelerator no componente subordinados que contém o foco atual antes de o devolver um resultado.

trans-unit.source: If the message cannot be handled immediately, you can re-dispatch it from within the TranslateAccelerator implementation if necessary, and then return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a mensagem não pode ser processada imediatamente, pode reemissão-lo a partir de dentro da implementação TranslateAccelerator, se necessário e, em seguida, regresse `false`.

trans-unit.source: A primary scenario for translating accelerator keys is handling the VK_TAB keydown message and determining whether to set focus within the component, to call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A> to a child component, or to call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite.OnNoMoreTabStops%2A> on the parent site because the tab sequence has reached the beginning or end bounds.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário primário para traduzir teclas de atalho é processar a mensagem de keydown VK_TAB e determinar se pretende definir o foco no componente, para chamar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>para um componente subordinado ou para chamar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite.OnNoMoreTabStops%2A>no principal do site porque a sequência de separador atingiu os limites de início ou fim.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSite.OnNoMoreTabStops%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.TabInto%2A>

trans-unit.source: Certain components may choose to not handle the tab key in this fashion.
trans-unit.target: Determinados componentes podem optar por não processar a tecla de tabulação este modo.

trans-unit.source: The message and associated data.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem e os dados associados.

trans-unit.source: Do not modify this structure.
trans-unit.target: Não modifique esta estrutura.

trans-unit.source: It is passed by reference for performance reasons only.
trans-unit.target: Este é transmitida por referência por motivos de desempenho apenas.

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Chaves de modificador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled by the method implementation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada pela implementação de método; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes WM_CHAR, WM_SYSCHAR, WM_DEADCHAR, and WM_SYSDEADCHAR input messages before <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens de entrada WM_CHAR, WM_SYSCHAR, WM_DEADCHAR e WM_SYSDEADCHAR antes <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic*>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic*>

trans-unit.source: If you implement this method to return `true`, the input architecture will not call <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic%2A> for that key message.
trans-unit.target: Se implementar este método para devolver `true`, a arquitetura de entrada não irá chamar <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic%2A>para essa mensagem chave.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message and associated data.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem e os dados associados.

trans-unit.source: Do not modify this structure.
trans-unit.target: Não modifique esta estrutura.

trans-unit.source: It is passed by reference for performance reasons only.
trans-unit.target: Este é transmitida por referência por motivos de desempenho apenas.

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: Chaves de modificador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed and <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic*> should not be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem foi processada e <xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic*>não deve ser chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink.OnMnemonic*>
